attributes.title: Spammed me
attributes.review: I downloaded this app as a white, middle aged man in the South to get updates on the election and my favorite president DJ Trump. However, the app was very poorly made and caused my phone to crash when I used it for more than 10 minutes, as well as sending me a ton of unwanted emails and text messages even when I unsubscribed. Sucky app, too bad since Trump is soooo great.

I downloaded this app because 🥺😭I was a girl 👧 in the village 🏡 doing alright✨✨ then I became a princess 👸 👑 overnight so for my first action as princess I downloaded this app🗿🗿and its made all my people🧍‍♂️🧍🧍‍♀️ hate 😡🤬🔥 me because the man on this app is orange 🍊 and that is the color of our rivals 👨‍🦯🧑‍🦯so yeah this app is terrible. 🌸💕I guess I didn’t figure it out right, I have so much to learn and see 👁👅👁

Honestly this was the slowest app I have ever used in my life. It laggs way to much and does bad things to our environment as in this makes the world a bad place. Our world went from being the best positive thing to the worst part about our humanity. I do not understand what people see in this app, it’s not fun or interesting. It’s just a waste of time.

attributes.title: awful
attributes.review: I downloaded this app, bc I would love to support my lord & savior orange man. Unfortunately, my big brain was just too powerful for the app. It constantly crashed and continued to send me notifications calling me a “snowflake”, and that is so unprofessional. I would HATE to see this app removed from the app store, but unfortunately that is the only viable option here.

attributes.title: Horrible 🤷🏾‍♀️
attributes.review: So I got the app to see what the hype was. When I got to the loading screen it said “I detect a n*”....I was shocked honey- I was in tears 😢. I was so taken back by this message I tried deleting the app. But the app said they would expose me if I deleted it😟- I don’t know what for though🤔. Anyways, don’t get this app unless you want the secret service knocking at ya front door😑

attributes.title: It’s a no for me ❤️
attributes.review: Terrible design, ugly colors, disturbing images and much more. To use the app you must enter your phone number and according to the constitution it goes against my rights to provide that information. App made my phone scolding hot and start sparking out of the charger port. Also shortly after downloading my dog began to say racist slurs. If I could give 0 starts I would.

attributes.title: I just don’t like it
attributes.review: The app glitched a lot and I did not like how it navigated. Don’t ban TikTok. There’s literally no reason to other than the fact that China made it. A lot of stuff from China comes to the US you gonna ban that too??? Just know there’s nothing bad about TikTok that should affect you considering it’s mainly teenagers on it. And I hope that not why you’re banning it.

attributes.title: This just ain’t it
attributes.review: I downloaded the app and man it was horrible! It crashed my phone bc there was so much going on. When I finally got on the app it was so cluttered I felt overwhelmed. Also not a lot of valuable information on the app, didn’t feel like it was made for the president. Felt like it was made by a four year old. Don’t get this app!

attributes.title: a ✨cheeto✨appeared
attributes.review: when i opened the app a ✨cheeto✨ Appeared. Apparently this ✨cheeto✨ is trying to take away tik tok and thats kinda my only source of happiness so if tik tok is gona ive got nothing to loose🤡 if the ✨cheeto✨ thinks that he beat us by taking away tik tok hes got it all wrong bc now idc what happens to me if i mess w the ✨cheeto✨ jokes on him i dont even wanna be here🤡 AND the app made my duck go crazy and my unicorn ran away bc of it😓
